item.jmmf.cookbook.title: Josh's Cookbook
item.jmmf.cookbook.datapackcredits.hover: ข้ามไปเครดิต
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_1: The Cooking Station lets you cook many of the new foods.
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_2:
Ingredients are put in the 6 slots at the left, in any order.
After cooking, the finished meal comes out at the big slot at the right.
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_3: Some recipes need water. The water tank can fit 16 recipes when full, and is refilled with a water bucket at the input slot at the top.
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_4: Put a bucket in the slot to empty the water instead (you won't get the water back).
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_5: The resulting bucket comes out at the next slot to the right.
item.jmmf.cookbook.cooking.desc_6: Many recipes need a container (such as bowls or pie crusts). These go in the container slot at the bottom.
item.jmmf.cookbook.knives.desc: Knives are used in recipes that require cutting (none exist yet). These can be made with any tool material.
item.jmmf.cookbook.rice.desc: Rice can be used in place of wheat in any recipe.
item.jmmf.cookbook.red_rice.desc: Red Rice can also be used in place of Rice.
item.jmmf.cookbook.tea.desc_1: Drinking Tea gives a soothing effect.
item.jmmf.cookbook.tea.desc_3: Black Tea has a stronger effect, but lasts half as long.
item.jmmf.cookbook.tea_leaves.desc:
Teas need Tea Leaves, which drop from oak, dark oak, and birch leaves.

Fortune increases their drop rate.
item.jmmf.cookbook.black_tea_leaves.desc: Black Tea instead needs Black Tea Leaves.
item.jmmf.cookbook.teacup.desc: You also need to craft Teacups to use as containers.
item.jmmf.cookbook.bread.desc: These breads can be used in place of normal bread in any recipe.
item.jmmf.cookbook.pies.desc: Some Pies may require Pie Crust as a container.
item.jmmf.cookbook.salads.desc: Any type of Leaves can be used in these recipes.
item.jmmf.cookbook.soups.desc: Broth may be needed in some soup recipes.
item.jmmf.cookbook.ice_cream.desc_1: Ice Cream might be a bit cold...
item.jmmf.cookbook.rotten_stew.desc: Rotten Stew can be used in place of Rotten Flesh in any other recipe or trade.
item.jmmf.cookbook.nutritionbook.desc: Want to know the nutritious value of these foods? Craft Josh's Book of Nutrition! (Hunger, Saturation, & Effects)
item.jmmf.cookbook.nutritionbook.skip: Skip to Josh's Book of Nutrition
item.jmmf.cookbook.credits.desc_1: For installing Josh's More Foods Datapack!

item.jmmf.gilded_tea.drink_text: ความสงบสุขซึมซาบในทุกจิบ...
